resources.string:
*** v1.42 ***
Source code released on GitHub.
IDE: Conversion of Eclipse on Android Studio.

*** v1.41 ***
Display the chessfield coordinates (a-h, 1-8)
Fixed: Interface error on some devices.

*** v1.40 ***
Source code is available from my homepage.

*** v1.39.2 ***
Troubleshooting in chess engine search.
Timeout added.

*** v1.39.1 ***
Fixed: problem with submenu call on some devices.

*** v1.39 ***
Translations:
Spanish - Sergio Revinelli, Sergio Ballesteros
Russian - Ark (hark, arkpc)

*** v1.38 ***
Troubleshooting: engine access error with multiple user accounts on tablets with Android 4.2.
Added: Option settings for playing strength(is not supported on all engines).

*** v1.37 ***
Horizontal button scrollview added (24 elements).
New graphics elements by Lars Streblow.
Sound effects added.

*** v1.36 ***
Redesign of the graphical user interface.
Menu button added.
Support for MIME type:
application/x-chess-pgn.
PGN download (web).
User manual (web).

*** v1.35 ***
PGN database:
search by ECO, opening, variation
fixed: some reported problems

*** v1.34 ***
Improving the PGN-File-Manager
Added: PGN supplemental tags
